SUB_C01_GMCK_DIVA_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva
SUB_C01_GMCK_DIVA_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.text:
I'm sensing unique biological energy
from an unknown life-form. 
What's going on here?

SUB_C01_GMCK_DIVA_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva
SUB_C01_GMCK_DIVA_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.text: I'm sensing that unique energy again.

SUB_C01_GMCK_DIVA_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva
SUB_C01_GMCK_DIVA_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.text: What are you doing there, then?

SUB_C01_GMCK_DIVA_TRADEDRUM_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva
SUB_C01_GMCK_DIVA_TRADEDRUM_000_CUT_000_.text:
This is a device for trading items.
But why is it in a place like this?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_00.text: At last, I have regained my true form!

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Oh my days, love! Your biological
energy is completely unmeasurable!

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_02.text:
I am regaining my powers as one of the undying.
I am still far from my full strength, however,
so you must guard me well.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_03.text: Is that so? All right then.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh boy. Oooh boy. Is this what
it's like outside of the Kosmos? Please, Canker! Pinch my cellular wall
and wake me from this horrid nightmare!
I don't want to be alone here!

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You're Erytheia, right, love? Oh, but
I'm glad to be able to meet you here!
Canker was carried off somewhere, then?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Foreign body detected! Oh, thank goodness!
Well, I have no use for Canker anymore.
Aaaaaand away you go!

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Now let us sally forth together!
You and I will need to get used to
being in the same boat, as it were.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
I wonder what you all call this place,
and what memories you have of it.
Ah, but this would be your first time
here, yes, Boudica?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Yeah, but it doesn't seem like there's
anything here. We gonna do some work?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
This is but a route between destinations.
First, we must connect the gateways,
which means it is your turn, Diva.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Mine? Oh dear, I dinnae think
I can do anything like that.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Your role is to decide the course of Albion's
National Extradimensional Exploratory Task
Force. Now go fulfill your duty!

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh? What's this? I see several
beams of lovely emerald light.

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Your scan function is all sorted, so only you
will see the results of your probability scans.
You can decide where we go; it makes no great
difference what you choose, so rest easy.

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Four beams of emerald light, love.
They each link to a door.

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text: Then pick one and let's go already!

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, one thing I forgot: You should have
high-speed movement functionality,
so you ought to give it a proper go.
Come on, then! Off you pop!

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
What's the difference between
high and normal speeds, then?

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
You'll just have to try it and see.
Everything's a new experience,
you know—especially in your case.

SUB_C01_DOOR_DIVA_FIRST_PORTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_DOOR_DIVA_FIRST_PORTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
While we seek many things beyond the door,
you seek your heart. So just go ahead and
do whatever you think best.

SUB_C01_DOOR_DIVA_FIRST_PORTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_DOOR_DIVA_FIRST_PORTAL_000_CUT_0.text: What even IS a mech's heart though?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
Right then! Do you feel as if a little
bit of your heart has been unlocked?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
I still dinnae understand what a 'heart' is
for me, even, but I do feel like something
has been released inside me.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
A better-than-expected result!
Now let's make for another doorway.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
Our ranks have ballooned with another
odd-duck ally. Is that a problem?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
No problem at all! Why, gathering odd
allies is one of the Exploratory Task
Force's most solemn duties!

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FIRSTMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
That's a suspicious attitude.
You'd best be careful.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
Right then! Do you feel as if much
of your heart has been unlocked?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
I still dinnae understand what a 'heart' is
for me, even, but I do feel like something
has been released inside me.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
Chuffed to hear it! That means our task
force's mission is proceeding apace.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Blath
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
Sure wish I knew what our
actual 'mission' even was.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
Our mission, my dear, is to go to other worlds,
gather up artifacts of their culture, and return
to Albion so we might present them to the royals.
It really couldn't be more simple.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_SECONDMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
Now, I understand it's not a glamorous or
flashy task like defeating a powerful enemy,
but it's one given us by the royal family,
which makes it a cracking important job.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well then? Have we finally drawn
near the core of your heart?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
I've not found anything regarding my 'heart.' 
Do I even have one, then? 'Cause every time
something unlocks inside me, I start to
doubt that a wee bit more.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
You're a mech, right? You should be able
to analyze such things without all of this
worry and carrying-on.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
Aye, but I cannae find what it is
I'm supposed to be analyzing.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Wednesday
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
You're overthinking it. When I fight,
I just share my capability assessment
with my battle armor and get after it!
I'm certain it works the same with you.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, I'm nothing but a heap of problems!
All I do is cause trouble for everyone.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Wednesday
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_000_CUT_000_.text:
It's no problem to cause trouble for us—
in fact, I think it's actually better!
That's what cooperation's about, right?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
All memory seals unlocked.
Starting memory scan and function check.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
Yes yes, we can do the checks later.
Right now, you should hop to and
transfer the song data you have.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
Aye, but I cannae guarantee 100% data
accuracy if I transfer it before I check
my memory.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
Quit your blathering and act already!
I need that data to restart 'It'!

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
And with that, the National Extradimensional
Exploratory Task Force's mission is finished.
I hereby declare us officially disbanded!

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text: What the bloody hell does that mean!?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Wednesday
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
He just up and left the group!
Ugh. Talk about the worst.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Wednesday
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
Yes, though I do feel like a certain
sense of kinship has been lost.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
I remember everything now. He was my
manager—but as to why he led the task
force or had me be part of it, I have no idea.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Wednesday
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
He basically yanked that data out of you.
Used you like a glorified thumb drive.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
The song data was sealed off so I
couldn't access it. But when my
functions were unlocked...

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
Let's just go after him and get the
information straight from the horse's
mouth. We can do that, right?

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
But why? I was the one he used;
it's nothing to do with the rest of ye.

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
We were all used by that man, Diva—
and we're all going to make him pay!

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Blath
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_000_CUT_000.text:
It's all right if you're angry, Diva.
In fact, you should be the angriest of
us all. Just listen to your heart in this.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, well done! Just as I calculated, you lot
followed right after me! Now then, I think
I'll have you perform a post-restart check.
Just give me a moment here...

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
A moment's how long you got until I
put my fist through your teeth!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text: Listen to me, all of you!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Afraid they're only going to listen after
they've knocked ye around a bit, love.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
Right then. What did you want to say?
Also, depending on what it is, you might
find yourself the recipient of additional
arse-kickings, so be ready for that.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Blath
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text: Hide nothing. We would hear it all.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
Now now, no need for any of that!
I'm quite happy to tell you good
eggs the truth about everything.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
Some time ago, we learned the data needed to
restart 'It' was stored at the Royal Museum 
in the form of an audio file.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
Copying said file, however, proved quite the
sticky wicket. So we turned to the diva-type
models because they can perfectly reproduce
data simply by listening to sound.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
Just so. Our plan required taking Diva here
from Avalon—but to protect the data, we had
to lock her memory. Thus, we designated it a 
forbidden song and sealed it off inside her.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
Since she was no longer a diva in form, I was
able to whisk her out of Avalon without anyone
so much as looking at me sideways. Clean as a
whistle and neat as a pin it was!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
Ah, but I think you know the rest:
we traveled all over and removed
the memory seal on Diva, which is
how we now find ourselves here.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
That's the most horrid thing I've ever heard!
Do you think we're just going to let you walk
away after learning all that!?

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text: Well, I am the villain here, so I suppose horrid is simply part of my skillset. Oh, and now that I've stalled long enough, 'It' is going to restart. Oh, but I'm ever so excited!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text:
Aaah ha ha! You think you've won? So long as I
have the data, I can restart 'It' over and over
again—which means all of the Conjoined Worlds
will once more be as one under us!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text:
HA HA HAAA! Oh, you silly heap of scrap!
Ah, but I must thank you, for you reproduced
the data perfectly—just as one would expect from
a songstress of your calibre! AAAH HA HA HA!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Wednesday
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text:
Your functions should be restored.
You can sing. So sing.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text:
Yes. Sing and prove it.
Prove this is music.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_020.text:
'It' restarts once more! Now all the
Conjoined Worlds will bow before the
power of our perfect, one world!

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, but it has been some time since I last
laid eyes upon the Junction. Now if you'd
be so kind as to hop to it, dear?

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_100_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_100_CUT_0.text:
I don't know what you're seeing, but I'll
leave it up to you to decide where we go.
Now if you would be so kind?

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_100_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_100_CUT_0.text:
I cannae claim to understand
what I'm doing here...

SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_100_CUT_0.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_SCAN_DIVA_INITIAL_WAVE_100_CUT_0.text:
He's telling you to do whatever you want.
So just...you know. Do that.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, but you DO like your little detours!
Well, I suppose that's fine, too.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It's not a detour, love.
I just dinnae know where to go.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text: I trust you'll figure it out in time.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Now now, no need to rush! Not that I'm
even sure you understand what I'm saying.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_CUT_000_.text:
We're nearly at the end of our
little task force's journey.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_CUT_000_.text:
Indeed—so you should endeavor to have as few
regrets as possible. Ah, but you are a machine,
so you probably don't even understand what a
regret is, do you?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_CUT_000_.text:
Regrets: Worries pertaining to things one feels
they should or should not have done. But as the
proper choice is only known in the future,
there's little point being concerned with them.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_CUT_000_.text:
Regrets, however, only arise if ye act in a way
contradictory to your own nature. So long as a
person is true to themselves, regrets cannae
ever take hold in any real way.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_CUT_000_.text:
Well, you certainly seem to have the
right of that particular little foible.
Do keep it up now!

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_THIRDMECH_100_CUT_000_.text:
Aye, I will. By the way, machines dinnae
have regrets. We accept all consequences,
then determine our next course of action.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_100_CUT_000.text:
Yes! It's finally done—which means I can
bid this absolutely filthy task force
an unfond farewell. You were all aces,
plaudits all around, cheers, goodbye.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_100_CUT_000.text:
He took some of my data with him:
song data that was sealed up.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Blath
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_100_CUT_000.text:
Did he really just call us
a 'filthy task force'?

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_100_CUT_000.text:
I'm afraid I lack the data to determine
our next course of action, loves.

SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_WRLD_DIVA_FOURTHMECH_100_CUT_000.text:
Well, that sod's the one with information,
so I vote we get after him!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
The filthy little band has followed me?
Oh, but I'm simply chuffed to the gills
to be such a popular fellow!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text: Why do ye call us filthy?

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text:
All you need to know is this: the fact
I left you behind after our collaboration
was finished was a mercy.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_000.text: That's it! I'm gonna shut your gob!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
All the members of the force hail from different worlds.
It's horrifying that so many foreign elements might gather
as one. Do you not think it very wrong that the Conjoined
Worlds are in such a state of disarray?

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
The cause of that wrongness is this:
all the worlds are connected.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
Nae! I visited other worlds because they're
connected, and that's how I found my heart!
And all the different encounters I had in
the different worlds were ever so lovely!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
Oh yes, each world has its own ecosystem,
society, and culture. But once that's all
boiled together, there's no way for them
to regain their original beauty.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
So worlds are better off separate, then? Nae,
I disagree. It made me happy to hear the music
of so many other worlds! Those new sounds and
connection moved my heart to...to...

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text: Of course. My heart. The thing that feels the music inside me is my heart—and it's been inside me all along! I just couldn't understand that because my memories were sealed up!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
We exist to rectify the contradiction that is the
Conjoined Worlds. Through them, beautiful worlds—
once connected—lose their beauty...and this perception
that machines have hearts must also be rectified.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
The power to correct the Conjoined Worlds—
and the key to unlock it—are both hidden in
Avalon. I merely used this machine to reclaim
what it is I needed.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
You manipulated us, you sod!
And I won't stand for it!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
A hammer asks no permission
from the nail, my dear.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Boudica
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
All right, that's it. I'm gonna punch
this clod right into next week.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text: Save a bit for me, love!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_010.text:
Aaah ha ha! You pathetic cretins can't do
anything, because 'It' is restarting! Oh,
how I look forward to what happens next!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_020.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_020.text:
You've won nothing! So long as I have the data,
'It' can be restarted over and over again! All of
the worlds will be isolated in beauty! We WILL
correct the contradiction of the Conjoined Worlds!

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_020.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_020.text:
Sing now, diva-type.
That is your primary function.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_020.speaker: Simon
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_020.text:
You can turn data into music.
You can move the heart.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_020.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_020.text: Yes, we all want to hear you sing.

SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_020.speaker: Constantine
SUB_C01_EVNT_DIVA_LASTBATTLE_100_CUT_020.text:
And now 'It' shall restart once more! You people
are the symbols of the filthy chaos that is the
Conjoined Worlds, and we shall bring back
our diverse heaven!
